from vpython import *

# Cyber Input Variable Mapping:
Length_I = 10
Radius_I = 1

# Constants
g = 9.81
Min_theta = -pi/4
Max_theta = pi/4

# Ideal simple pendulum
def ideal_pendulum(theta_0):
    L = Length_I
    T = 2*pi*sqrt(L/g)
    omega = 2*pi/T
    theta = theta_0
    ball = sphere(pos=vector(L*sin(theta), -L*cos(theta), 0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)
    rod = cylinder(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), axis=ball.pos, radius=0.01, color=color.yellow)
    t = 0
    dt = 0.01
    while True:
        rate(100)
        theta = theta_0*cos(omega*t)
        if theta < Min_theta:
            theta = Min_theta
        elif theta > Max_theta:
            theta = Max_theta
        ball.pos = vector(L*sin(theta), -L*cos(theta), 0)
        rod.axis = ball.pos
        t += dt

# Pendulum with air resistance
def resistive_pendulum(theta_0, b):
    L = Length_I
    T = 2*pi*sqrt(L/g)
    omega = 2*pi/T
    theta = theta_0
    ball = sphere(pos=vector(L*sin(theta), -L*cos(theta), 0), radius=Radius_I, color=color.red)
    rod = cylinder(pos=vector(0, 0, 0), axis=ball.pos, radius=0.01, color=color.yellow)
    theta_dot = 0
    t = 0
    dt = 0.01
    while True:
        rate(100)
        theta_double_dot = -b*theta_dot - g/L*sin(theta)
        theta_dot += theta_double_dot*dt
        theta += theta_dot*dt
        if theta < Min_theta:
            theta = Min_theta
            theta_dot = 0
        elif theta > Max_theta:
            theta = Max_theta
            theta_dot = 0
        ball.pos = vector(L*sin(theta), -L*cos(theta), 0)
        rod.axis = ball.pos
        t += dt
